replies.txt_content:
java.lang.StackOverflowError: Exception while updating neighbours
多方块结构数据过大        JVM Flags: 15 total; -Xincgc -Xmx6G -Xms6G -Xss512K -XX:+AggressiveOpts -XX:+UseCompressedOops -XX:+UseCMSCompactAtFullCollection -XX:+UseFastAccessorMethods -XX:ParallelGCThreads=2 -XX:+UseConcMarkSweepGC -XX:CMSFullGCsBeforeCompaction=2 -XX:CMSInitiatingOccupancyFraction=70 -XX:-DisableExplicitGC -XX:-DisableExplicitGC -XX:TargetSurvivorRatio=90
-Xss2048K

还不行则以M为单位慢慢加 或        at mekanism.common.multiblock.UpdateProtocol.loopThrough(UpdateProtocol.java:232)
